sentences.sContent: The painting was judged a fake.
...the stolen data was showing up on fake cards and being used for online purchases...
...to a hearty embrace of fake science...

exam.question: Some criminals were printing ______ dollar bills until they were arrested.

answer.explain: 句意： 一些罪犯直到被逮捕才停止印假美钞。decent： 正派的， 有分寸的； patent： 特许的， 专利的； suspicious： 可疑的。

phrases.pCn: 人造革；假裘皮；仿造皮毛

words.tran: 摊贩；骗子；伪造者，伪装者

trans.tranOther: a copy of a valuable object, painting etc that is intended to deceive people
not real and seeming to be something it is not, in order to deceive people
